title: Textile

creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Pattern incomplete. Ogives formed of three layers of dashed black lines, innermost with a pale yellow fill; black center with ivory flowering branch; ivory ground. Direction of ogives alternates from vertical to horizontal orientation.
